headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Valuation Check After Leadership Shift And Long Term Biomethane Deal
summary: Leadership and sustainability moves put PepsiCo (PEP) in focus PepsiCo (PEP) is back on investors’ radar after appointing Savitha Balachandran as Chief Financial Officer for India and South Asia and signing a 10 year biomethane supply agreement with Engie for its UK operations. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo.
